title: Pig Iron Production for France
notes:
Source: Data For 1910-1911: Furnished By The Comite Des Forges De France. Data For 1912-1914: L'Echo Des Mines, 1912, P. 150; 1914, P. 2183. Data For 1920-1939: Bulletin De Statistique Generale (Cross Checked With Annales Des Mines; London And Cambridge Economic Services; Indices Generaux Du Mouvement Economiques En France, L'Economiste European).

This NBER data series m01189 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01189
